title: OPL Split 2 Week 6 Tipping!
body:
Hey everyone!

http://i.imgur.com/Y3WUesP.jpg

Split 2 Week 6 of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is up next!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 29th of June.

[Click here](http://goo.gl/forms/ewNo9mNCG8) to go to the tipping form

This week anyone that can pick **8 matches** correctly will get the **250 RP!** 

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Monday 29th of June at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with which match up you think will be the hardest to call and why!
